entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 11:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
